Summary: It was a yellow light and it made no sound.
divs: Sighting Detailsit waqs around 6 o'clock when my dad told me that he had a surprize for me. but i couldn't see the bag that was for me so i accidentally grab a grocicery bag of garbage and when i went to bring it inside. so i stopped to look at te sky because i was board then i saw this big yellow light and it made no sound. i thought it was cool then i got scared and ran inside.
